Data set of amicus interventions in each ruling

Source: R/amicus.R
amicus.Rd

The amicus dataset contains a list of individuals and organizations who intervened in the ruling by presenting an "amicus curiae."

Usage

amicus

Format

A data frame with three variables:

id

Ruling ID

name

Name of the individual

affiliation

An organization, government agency, university, NGO, union, social movement, etc.

Details

Unlike the other datasets in this package, this one is not very well standardized. So you might have to do a lot of cleaning to work with this.

Examples

  amicus
#> # A tibble: 41,133 × 3
#>    id       name                           affiliation                          
#>    <chr>    <chr>                          <chr>
